parameters.description: The URI is an adaptive value path. If the path begins with a single slash '/', the URI will be parsed as an adaptive value path (example: /adaptorId/objectType/objectId.propertyNames)
parameters.name: isValuePath

parameters.description: If isValuePath is true, this is the current path that is used to resolve relative paths. If isValuePath is not true, this parameter is ignored.
parameters.name: currentPath
